subtitleNullable: Contains resources for Bangla/Bengali sentiment classification
descriptionNullable:
### Contains training and test sets as well as the manually created Twitter-specific lexicons for the following paper,

### [*Performing Sentiment Analysis in Bangla Microblog Posts*](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/6850712)

### The resources are made available to encourage more research in Bangla sentiment classification and other NLP tasks.

Please cite the paper if you use the dataset or lexicon
